org.onexus.collection.api

Interface ICollectionManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IResourceService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CollectionManager

    public interface ICollectionManager
extends IResourceService

    A ICollectionManager manage the life-cycle of a collection. We can have a non-blocking ICollectionManager, so it will return partial IEntityTable result with a Progress in process. It is the user that have to keep calling getTaskStatus() method until the task is done and then call again the load() method with the same query to get all the results.

    This is the typical event sequence the first time that one collection is required:

    • CM = ICollectionManager
    • CS = ICollectionStore
    • TM = ITaskManager
    • TE = ITaskExecutor
    • TC = ITaskCallable
    Author:
    Jordi Deu-Pons
